text: activists are making some noise down on

activists wear suits and they want to

used to call Carl Icahn but look he's

I talked to Sanjay sang-gui a banker and
author of the thriller killing Wall
Street to find out what's going on

that's the question that I think is on a

and there we think well are they out for

that's driving these sort of decisions
and pressure on companies to produce

the same thing going on with management
- with CEOs the Ackman's and the icons
they used to be fringe players now
they're mainstream and going after

reason they're getting involved there's

billion dollars under management today
they've more than 65 billion when an

this claim is just not supported by the

sometimes the activists win sometimes
